title: Switching Between Practices
body:
Switching Between Practices
To switch between practices while logged into MediRecords, follow the below instructions:
  From the Homepage you will see the MediRecords logo click on the drop-down provided. Select the name of the practice you would like to switch to.
You will then be successfully moved to the desired practice.
  Want to know more? Return to our support desk home page by following the below link.
HOME PAGE
